original_text: And Jacob heard that he had defiled Dinah his daughter: now his sons were with his cattle in the field: and Jacob held his peace until they were come.
korean_text: 야곱이 그 딸 디나를 그가 더럽혔다 함을 들었으나 자기의 아들들이 들에서 목축하므로 그들이 돌아오기까지 잠잠하였고

sentences.original_text: that he had defiled Dinah his daughter
now his sons were with his cattle in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들들은 밭에서 가축과 함께 있었고
